header: Authoring modules on CPAN is very often an act of love, and from all times the community explored ways to say 'thank you' to the people who make the Perl ecosystem what it is. Recently, the site Gittip caught a few eyes, and now sees a budding Perl community. Some of the links of this week discuss how to join the party, and why it might a good thing.  Beyond this, we have news of a new Mojolicious-centered conference happening in May, a preview of what's coming in Perl 5.20, and a nice collection of tutorials. Enjoy! ~ `/anick
subject: Say It With Flowers
